Russian: Игра сама по себе как ностальгия, начиная от CS 1.5, 1.6 и Source, но есть многие плохие моменты... Такие как читеры, мошенники. Сколько лет уже игре, а борьбы с этим наверное процентов 10%. Я рекомендую и с другой стороны, не рекомендую в её играть, игра хорошая, но не для психически больных людей, по типу меня с биполярным расстройством, но у меня есть антидепрессанты : )
English: The game itself is similar to nostalgia, starting with CS 1.5, 1.6 and Source, but there are a lot of bad points... For example, swindlers, swindlers. How many years already game, and struggle with this perhaps percent 10%. I recommend and on the other hand, I do not recommend playing it, the game is good, but not for mentally ill people like me with bipolar disorder, but I have antidepressants : )
The new MCC music collab just shows how much the devs care about this game. Absolute classic.

Jogo muito bom, recomento a todos.
Gosto da jogabilidade, das possibilidade de estrategias e a team play.
Não tem a opção de jogar com jogadores inferiores, quando ficamos um tempo sem jogar temos que ficar treinando com os BOT's até voltar a "velha forma".
一到放假期间，挂就非常的多，我觉得嘛，一开始的玩家不买优先把把挂，根本打不了（什么陀螺，自瞄最起码透视还可以打一打 ，但是放假期间，官匹优先级别把把有，单人还好，队友挂但是跟朋友玩基本排位一直输，非常影响心态。VAC 真的需要改进 还有 overwatch 的系统 跟进 把大部分 "大挂 "消除 最起码"小挂"还可以打一打.

Cs is great, its a game you can sit down and have 1 game of or its a game you put effort into. When you get into it and play nearly a whole day its gonna repeat itself trough-out the week. The game is tactical, strategic and of course competetive. There is cosmetic items that grants nothing, just cosmetic so it not pay to win. CS:GO is a game that takes time to learn aswell so you wont be a pro right away like in most other games. Counter strike also has some game modes you can play when you are bored or just wanna try some new stuff. The good thing with cs is that it free so why dont you check it for yourself and give it a go.
